title: Smooth Peanut Soup
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons finely chopped onion', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '250ml whipping cream', '260g smooth peanut butter', '75g peanuts, ground in a food processor', '1 litre chicken stock', 'salt and pepper to taste']
